overview: When he crosses the border into the United States, Mexican wrestler El Alambrista finds himself fighting rival lucha libre grapplers in the ring and battling powerful American anti-immigration forces in the fields and ranches far outside it. As he becomes a folk hero to migrant workers, El Alambrista must also save the life of a young child. Bonus features include a match between pro Mexican wrestlers Yako and Pequeno Guerrero.
title: El Alambrista: The Fence Jumper
